remarks: Cancellation law for multiplication.  Theorem I.7 of [Apostol] p. 18. (Contributed by NM, 26-Jan-1995.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
statement:
mulcand.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
mulcand.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
mulcand.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
mulcand.4 $e |- ( ph -> C =/= 0 ) $.
mulcand $p |- ( ph -> ( ( C x. A ) = ( C x. B ) <-> A = B ) ) $.
